instruction.en:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-1-course-2-task-1-.png)

Display the sum of the numbers 5 and 7 in the console.

Similar example:
```python
print(10 + 25)
```
instruction.ru:
![](https://course-qa-basics.s3.us-west-1.amazonaws.com/section-1-course-2-task-1-.png)

Выведите в консоль сумму чисел 5 и 7.

Похожий пример:
```python
print(10 + 25)
```
